name: Materiell
description:
Advanced WordPress Development | Enterprise WordPress Managed Hosting and Support.
Materiell provides a fully-featured cloud dashboard that allows you to manage your WordPress website(s) in high-availability containers on the Google Cloud. Our platform (as a service) makes it easy to manage your WordPress sites in one dashboard while retaining full control of your Google Cloud account. Our experienced cloud infrastructure team manages your GCP resources and makes sure your site(s) runs reliably using self healing, container technology. Features: --Automated backups w/Easy Restore --Dev/Staging/Production Environments --High-Availability Hosting Configuration --Easy Spinup of WordPress Sites --Global CDN --User Management --Automated SSL Certificate Generation --Installation of Custom SSL Certificates --Advanced WordPress-Specific Server Caching 
--GSA IT70 Contract Holder, Schedule 132-51 IT Professional Services.
